languages.text: Краткая жизнь сущности, носивших имя Номос, была завершена на мире Эпитафия. Юное существо сгинули в водовороте породивших их энергий Осколка К'тан, пожранные собственным создателем. Звездные вампиры от природы не умели дарить или отдавать, хищническое поглощение было величайшим их инстинктом, потому Номос приказано было перестать существовать и влиться в могучее тело древнего божества потоком послушной энергии.

The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.
languages.original_text: Краткая жизнь сущности, носивших имя Номос, была завершена на мире Эпитафия. Юное существо сгинули в водовороте породивших их энергий Осколка К'тан, пожранные собственным создателем. Звездные вампиры от природы не умели дарить или отдавать, хищническое поглощение было величайшим их инстинктом, потому Номос приказано было перестать существовать и влиться в могучее тело древнего божества потоком послушной энергии.

traits.locale_text: The short life of an entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young creature perished in the whirlwind of the energies of the Shard of C'Tan, that once spawned it — devoured by its creator. The star vampires did not possess the ability to give or gift by their nature. Predatory consumption was their greatest instinct, and thus Nomos was ordered to cease existing and to pour itself into the mighty body of the ancient deity in a stream of obedient energy.

The short life of an entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young creature perished in the whirlwind of the energies of the Shard of C'Tan, that once spawned it — devoured by its creator. The star vampires did not possess the ability to give or gift by their nature. Predatory consumption was their greatest instinct, and thus Nomos was ordered to cease existing and to pour itself into the mighty body of the ancient deity in a stream of obedient energy.

The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of energy that once spawned it, created by the Shard of C'tan. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and dissipate as a stream of obedient energy into the mighty body of the ancient deity.

The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of energy that once spawned it, created by the Shard of C'tan. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and dissipate as a stream of obedient energy into the mighty body of the ancient deity.

The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

languages.text: 名叫“诺莫斯”的实体在荒垄碑碣上结束了它短暂的生命。这个由星神碎片创造的年轻生物被它的创造者所吞噬，在曾孕育它的能量风暴中死去。噬星者的本性根本不存在什么无私的给予和馈赠，掠夺与吞噬才是他们的本能。因此，诺莫斯的存在被消除了，它变成了一股顺从的能量，流入古代神明强大的躯体之中。
languages.original_text: The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

traits.locale_text: 名叫“诺莫斯”的实体在荒垄碑碣上结束了它短暂的生命。这个由星神碎片创造的年轻生物被它的创造者所吞噬，在曾孕育它的能量风暴中死去。噬星者的本性根本不存在什么无私的给予和馈赠，掠夺与吞噬才是他们的本能。因此，诺莫斯的存在被消除了，它变成了一股顺从的能量，流入古代神明强大的躯体之中。

languages.text: Das kurze Leben der Einheit namens Nomos endete auf Epitaph. Das junge Wesen wurde von seinem Schöpfer verschlungen. Es starb in eben jenem Wirbelwind aus C'tan-Fragment-Energie, aus dem es einst hervorgegangen war. Es lag nicht in der Natur der Sternenvampire, willentlich zu geben oder zu schenken. Räuberisches Verschlingen war ihr primärer Instinkt, und so erhielt Nomos den Befehl, seine Existenz einzustellen und sich als Strom der gehorsamen Energie im mächtigen Körper der uralten Gottheit aufzulösen.
languages.original_text: The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

traits.locale_text: Das kurze Leben der Einheit namens Nomos endete auf Epitaph. Das junge Wesen wurde von seinem Schöpfer verschlungen. Es starb in eben jenem Wirbelwind aus Energie, aus dem es einst hervorgegangen war, erschaffen vom C'tan-Fragment. Es lag nicht in der Natur der Sternenvampire, willentlich zu geben oder zu schenken. Räuberisches Verschlingen war ihr primärer Instinkt, und so erhielt Nomos den Befehl, seine Existenz einzustellen und sich als Strom der gehorsamen Energie im mächtigen Körper der uralten Gottheit aufzulösen.

languages.text: La courte vie de l'entité du nom de Nomos prit fin sur Épitaphe. Le jeune être fut dévoré par son créateur et trouva la mort dans le même tourbillon d'énergie du C'tan qui l'avait vu naître. Il n'était pas dans la nature des vampires stellaires de donner volontairement. Leur instinct premier était la consommation prédatrice. Ainsi, il fut ordonné à Nomos de cesser d'exister et de se fondre en un flux d'énergie dans le puissant corps de la divinité.
languages.original_text: The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

traits.locale_text: La courte vie de l’entité du nom de Nomos prit fin sur Épitaphe. Le jeune être fut dévoré par son créateur et trouva la mort dans le même tourbillon d'énergie qui l'avait vu naître, un produit de l’Écharde C'tan. Il n'était pas dans la nature des vampires stellaires de donner volontairement. Leur instinct premier était la consommation prédatrice. Ainsi, il fut ordonné à Nomos de cesser d'exister et de se dissiper tel un flux d'énergie dans le puissant corps de la divinité.

languages.text: La corta vida de la entidad conocida como Nomos terminó en Epitafio. El joven ser fue devorado por su creador, muriendo en el mismo torbellino de energía de C'tan del que surgió, absorbido por su propio creador. Los devoradores de estrellas no dan ni regalan nada por voluntad propia. Su instinto primario es consumir, por lo que Nomos recibió la orden de dejar de existir y volver a formar parte del poderoso cuerpo de la deidad ancestral.
languages.original_text: The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

traits.locale_text: La corta vida de la entidad conocida como Nomos terminó en Epitafio. El joven ser fue devorado por su creador, muriendo en el mismo torbellino de energía del que surgió, creado por el fragmento de C'tan. Los devoradores de estrellas no dan ni regalan nada por voluntad propia. Su instinto primario es consumir, por lo que Nomos recibió la orden de dejar de existir y volver a formar parte del poderoso cuerpo de la deidad ancestral.

languages.text: ノモスという名を与えられた実体の短い生涯は、エピタフで幕を閉じた。その若き存在は、かつてク＝タン・シャードによって生み出されたエネルギーの渦の中で、創造主に食い尽くされて死んだ。スター・ヴァンパイアの性質上、、何かを進んで与えたり贈ったりすることはなかった。捕食が彼らの第一の本能であった。故にノモスは存在することをやめ、従順なエネルギーの流れの中で、として古代の神の強大な体と融合することを命じられた。
languages.original_text: The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

traits.locale_text: ノモスという名を与えられた実体の短い生涯は、エピタフで幕を閉じた。その若き存在は、かつてク＝タン・シャードによって生み出されたエネルギーの渦の中で、創造主に食い尽くされて死んだ。スター・ヴァンパイアの性質上、、何かを進んで与えたり贈ったりすることはなかった。捕食が彼らの第一の本能であった。故にノモスは存在することをやめ、従順なエネルギーの流れの中で、として古代の神の強大な体と融合することを命じられた。

languages.text: Nomos isimli varlığın kısa hayatı, Sinyazıt'ta son buldu. Genç varlık, kendisini meydana getiren C'tan Parçası enerjilerinin hortumunda yok olarak yaratıcısı tarafından tüketildi. Bir şeyler vermek veya armağan etmek, yıldız vampirlerinin tabiatında değildir, birincil içgüdüleri tüketmektir. Bu nedenle Nomos'a, varlığını sonlandırma ve kadim ilahın kudretli bedeninde itaatkâr bir enerji akışına dâhil olması emredildi.
languages.original_text: The short life of the entity named Nomos ended on Epitaph. The young being was devoured by its maker, perishing in the very whirlwind of C'tan Shard energies that once spawned it, devoured by their own creator. It was not in the nature of the star vampires to willingly give or gift. Predatory consumption was their primary instinct, and thus Nomos were ordered to cease existing and merge in a stream of obedient energy with the mighty body of the ancient deity.

traits.locale_text: Nomos isimli varlığın kısa hayatı Kitabe'de sona erdi. Genç varlık, yaratıcısı tarafından tüketildi, onu meydana getiren C'tan Parçası enerjilerinin hortumunda yok oldu, onlar da yaratıcıları tarafından tüketildi. Gönüllü olarak vermek veya armağan etmek, yıldız vampirlerinin tabiatında yoktu. Birincil içgüdüleri tüketmekti ve bu nedenle Nomos'a varlığını sonlandırma ve kadim ilahın kudretli bedeninde, itaatkâr bir enerji akışına dâhil olması emri verildi.
